title: Pennye Ford - REMASTERS (Best of Collection)
description:
Some of you may remember this lady as the lead voice in the group called SNAP, she also sang background for the group THE GAP BAND as well as sung backup for Chaka Khan and if you listen closely during certain songs you can hear that she at times like Vesta sounds like Chaka Khan with a hint of Evelyn Champagne King...all great singers to be compared to.

So here is a compilation album by Ms. Pennye Ford called PENNYE that has her greatest hits like CHANGE YOUR WICKED WAYS, DANGEROUS, UH OH and some serious REMIXES of DANGEROUS and CHANGE YOUR WICKED WAYS.

I really hope you enjoy her music, because I sure do. And remember SEED SEED SEED, that is the only way to keep music a live.

ALBUM INCLUDES:

Pennye Ford - I Feel The Music
Pennye Ford - Uh Oh, I Made A Mistake
Pennye Ford - Change Your Wicked Ways
Pennye Ford - Serious Love
Pennye Ford - Don't You Know That I Love You
Pennye Ford - Ready For Love
Pennye Ford - Dangerous
Pennye Ford - Never Let You Go
Pennye Ford - Spend My Time With You
Pennye Ford - Change Your Wicked Ways Remix 12" Extended
Pennye Ford - Uh Oh, I made A Mistake 12" Long Version
Pennye Ford - Change your Wicked Ways 12" Remix #1
Pennye Ford - Dangerous Single Remix
Pennye Ford - Uh Oh, I Made A Mistake 12" Instrumental
Pennye Ford - Change Your Wicked Ways M+M Remix
